title: 07/13/21 DPS Hour 1
itunes:title: 07/13/21 DPS Hour 1
description:
Dan talks about the MLB Home Run Derby and how fun it was to watch. Dan says that he thinks baseball won last night. Dan gives his opinion of the USA Men's Basketball Team losing again.
